summary: Small interactive player home near Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=4]- [color=#6d9eeb]Thur[/color] -[/size]
[size=3]A person to whom all loyalty is owed, not as a matter of oaths but the natural order of rule. [/size]
[size=3]Only the strongest can be named thur.[/size]

[size=5]- [color=#6d9eeb]Description[/color] -[/size]

[size=3]Small interactive player home located near Winterhold. Has a custom axe, adjustable lighting, furniture and more.
Key is on the table infront of the house.
[/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=3][u]No DLCs are needed
[/u][/size][/color]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4214?]Skyrim Special Edition Version[/url][/size]

[size=3]If lights start to flicker, turn some of them off.
[/size]
[youtube]KdX4vjNIBAA[/youtube][youtube]IpA6-p1FkLE[/youtube]
[youtube]loXyd9yTVAE[/youtube]
Thur's Retreat review starts at 1:43

[size=5]- [color=#6d9eeb]Features[/color] -[/size]

[size=3]- Alchemy, enchanting, everything for smithing, cookpot, woodchoping block
- Follower and horse friendly
- Custom made and named storage
- Thur's Axe
- Nice view[/size]

[size=3]Has a lot of activatable objects. Listed below:
- All the lighting in and out of the house, including the shutters for natural light
(Opened shutters are visible from the outside)
- Movable chairs, bedroll and cookpot
- Changeable rugs
- House ledger for additional changes to the house
- Hangable Thur's Axe and Woodcutter's axe (outside)[/size]

[size=5]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Other Mods[/url] -[/size]

[size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?][size=4]Rigmor of Bruma[/size][/url][size=4][/size]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod


[/size][/font][size=3]Special thanks to:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1734939/?]Billyro[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74575/?]Thur's Axe
[/url][/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5650734/?]mrpdean[/url] for the resources from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55154/?]Lakeview Manor Evolution[/url][/size][/center]
author: 1xmiha
